alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 2:58PM EDT until March 15 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TUESDAY TO 2 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...From 2 AM Tuesday to 2 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of one half inch to one inch per hour are possible Tuesday morning and afternoon. The high sun angle could limit total snow accumulations during the day Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
